name: 01ShowNewCustomersSince2016
value:
// Show new customers since 2016
FOR c IN customers
  FILTER c.memberSince >= "2016"
  RETURN c

05Show10FirstItemsWithPriceAtLeast200
value:
// Show 10 first items with a price of at least 200
FOR i IN items
  FILTER i.price >= 200
  LIMIT 10
  RETURN i

name: 06ShowSalesOctober2016
07JoinThePrice
value:
// Join the price
FOR s IN sales
  FILTER s.date >= "2016-10-01" && s.date < "2016-11-01"
  SORT s.date
  FOR i IN items
    FILTER i._id == s._to
    RETURN { date: s.date, billingId: s.billingId, price: i.price }

name: 08ShowCompleteOrders
value:
// Show complete orders
FOR s IN sales
  FOR i IN items
    FILTER i._id == s._to
    COLLECT bill = s.billingId INTO items
    FOR c IN customers
      FILTER c._id == items[0].s._from
      RETURN { date: items[0].s.date, billingId: bill,
               name: c.name, price: SUM(items[*].i.price),
               items: items[*].i }
